location.physicalLocation: British Library: India Office Records and Private Papers

titleInfo.title: Ext 6702/45 'Raising of Status of French Legation at Tehran to that of Embassy.'

physicalDescription.extent: The arrangement consists of a single letter.

Foliation: the foliation sequence (used for referencing) commences at the front cover with 1, and terminates at the inside back cover with 5; these numbers are written in pencil and are located in the top right corner of the recto side of each folio.

mods.abstract: This file consists of a letter from the British Embassy, Tehran, to HM Principal Secretary of State for Foreign Affairs, describing the state of the French Legation in Tehran, especially as related to French influence in Persia.
